description: Clay pots are traditional containers made from natural clay, used for cooking and storing food. They are eco-friendly and help in maintaining the natural taste of food.
steps: Source natural clay from local suppliers.
Shape the clay into pots using traditional methods.
Dry the pots in the sun to avoid energy consumption.
Fire the pots in a kiln using sustainable fuels.
Promote the use of clay pots in local communities.
risks: Over-extraction of clay leading to environmental degradation
Potential for cracking during drying or firing
Market competition from plastic and metal containers
